abstract: Government reports will include sales of existing homes for December, and companies reporting earnings will include Verizon, Google, I.B.M., McDonald’s, Apple and Microsoft.
snippet: Government reports will include sales of existing homes for December, and companies reporting earnings will include Verizon, Google, I.B.M., McDonald’s, Apple and Microsoft.
lead_paragraph: ECONOMIC REPORTS Financial markets, government offices and many businesses will be closed on Monday in the United States in observance of Martin Luther King’s Birthday. Data will include sales of existing homes for December (Tuesday); weekly jobless claims and leading economic indicators for December (Thursday); and sales of new homes for December (Friday).

headline.main: Economic Reports for the Week Ahead
headline.print_headline: Economic Reports for the Week Ahead
